text: Bottle Squad with a boom we are ready to zoom
Bottle Squad!
Bottle Squad ! Be strong,
Be brave,
Be smart,
Be kind
Solving problems we don’t mind!
We are the closest friends you’ll ever find.
Bottle Squad
Ba Ba Bottle Squad
Then one day “Sorry to interrupt story time, babies, But, you are needed in the jungle.
The finger family got lost playing hide and seek and can’t find each other”
“Ba ba boom, we are ready to zoom”

Daddy finger, Daddy finger
Where are you?

Here I am! Here I am!
How do you do?

Daddy finger, Daddy finger
Where are you?

There he is! There he is!
Stuck in a tree

Mommy Finger, Mommy finger 
where are you?

Here I am, here I am!
How do you do?

Mommy Finger Mommy Finger 
Where are you?

There she is, There she is 
Hiding in the cave

Brother finger, Brother finger
Where are you?

Here I am, Here I am
How do you do?

Brother finger, Brother finger
Where are you?

There he is, There he is
Playing with the monkeys

Sister finger, Sister finger
Where are you?

Here I am, Here I am
How do you do?

Sister finger, Sister finger
Where are you?

There she is, There she is
Sitting on a rock..

Baby Finger, Baby finger
Where are you?
Make a sound, make a sound So we can hear you

Baby Finger, Baby finger
Where are you?

There she is, There she is
Asleep and in bliss

Thank you babies, thank you babies
For finding us!
Happy to, Happy toL et’s get you home!

If you need our help, you can count on us!
That’s our Ba-Ba Promise to you!
